name: scrawl
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to write something quickly, without trying to make your writing tidy or easy to read: I scrawled a quick note to Judith and put it under her door. Someone had scrawled graffiti across the wall. Synonym
scribble

to write something in a fast, messy way: Someone had scrawled graffiti on the side of our garage. scrawl noun [ C ] us
Your browser doesn't support HTML5 audio
/skrɔl/
I had trouble reading the uneven scrawl of his signature.
